subsection.name: Spreadsheet hiding
subsection.p: You can hide some sheet dynamically in your Excel export with the method void setSpreadsheetsToHide(String[] names) of XLSTransformer class. It takes the names of spreadsheets to hide.

subsection.name: Spreadsheet renaming
subsection.p: Sometimes it is required to set sheet name dynamically. It can be done with void setSpreadsheetToRename(String name, String newName) method of XLSTransformer. This method takes template spreadsheet name and schedules it to be renamed into newName. The method may be invoked multiple times.
